items.title: Morgan Stanley upgrades this semiconductor stock primed to rally nearly 30%
items.description: Analyst Shane Brett upgraded KLA to overweight from equal weight and lifted his price target by $122 to $870, which implies more than 29% potential up...

items.title: Here are Monday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Tesla, Broadcom, Apple, Cava, Meta, Alphabet and more
items.description: Here are Monday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

items.title: Stifel trims Tesla price target, citing lower sales expectations and political risks
items.description: Analyst Stephen Gengaro reiterated his buy rating but trimmed his price target by $19 to $455, which still implies more than 72% potential upside.

items.title: This cruise stock can rally 30% and withstand an economic slowdown, Jefferies says
items.description: Norwegian Cruise Line could be the most reliable cruise stock during a broader economic slowdown, according to Jefferies.

items.title: Top Wall Street analysts are confident about the prospects for these 3 stocks
items.description: Amid the ongoing volatility, TipRanks found three favored stocks, including Microsoft, to keep in mind.
